name: Smol Nubbin Dream Escape
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #10. I found out the jam was happening while I was at work yesterday, and I just decided that I'd try to upload something for once - first game and first game jam. This is very rough so bear with me.

So, this is a game about a lil fry bit,  Smol Nubbin, who is stuck in a weird platformer-like dream. Every time he tries to make his way to the pink block exit, he somehow ends up somewhere else. Try to make your way to the end.

Use the arrows to make your way around

GodotEngine v3.1

All assets made by me - MRLetharky

except for music - @activation
